messages.speaker: user
messages.text: I can't believe this happened to me.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: I worked so hard on that project and they just rejected it.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: Maybe I'm just not good enough for this.

messages.speaker: assistant
messages.text: I hear how disappointed you are. Tell me more about what happened.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: I spent weeks on it. Every detail was perfect. But they said it wasn't what they wanted.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: I'm so angry and sad at the same time. I don't know what to do.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: Wait... actually, they gave me some really helpful feedback.

messages.speaker: user
messages.text: Maybe I can use this to make it even better. Yeah, I'm going to try again!
